author: Reid Hoffman
title: What LinkedIn Founder Reid Hoffman Learned From an Early Failure
text:
I’ve given a lot of people this piece of entrepreneurial advice: “If you are not embarrassed by the first version of your product, you’ve launched too late.” What most people don’t know is the story behind how I learned that painful but valuable lesson.
Today, social networks are among the most widely used products in the world. But their success wasn’t inevitable. I should know, because in 1997, long before I started LinkedIn or invested in Facebook, I founded my first startup, SocialNet.
...
